TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WcfCommunicationListener`1<TServiceContract> extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener

Docs.typeparam: Type of the WCF service contract.
Docs.summary: A Windows Communication Foundation based listener for Service Fabric based stateless or stateful service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Fabric.ServiceContext serviceContext, !TServiceContract wcfServiceObject) cil managed

Docs.param: The context of the service for which this communication listener is being constructed.
WCF service implementing the specified WCF service contract.
Docs.summary: Constructs a WCF based communication listener that uses default binding and default endpoint address.

remarks.para: The default listener binding is created using method.

The default endpoint address is created using the endpoint resource defined in the service manifest. The name of the endpoint resource is derived from the WCF service contract type using method. If matching endpoint resource is not found in the service manifest, a default endpoint resource definition with port zero is used.

MemberSignature.Value: public WcfCommunicationListener (System.Fabric.ServiceContext serviceContext, TServiceContract wcfServiceObject, System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding listenerBinding = null, System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress address = null);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Fabric.ServiceContext serviceContext, !TServiceContract wcfServiceObject, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding listenerBinding, class System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress address) cil managed

Docs.param: The context of the service for which this communication listener is being constructed.
WCF service implementing the specified WCF service contract.
The binding to use for the WCF endpoint. If the listenerBinding is not specified or it is null, a default listener binding is created using method.

The listen address for the WCF endpoint. If the address is not specified or it is null, a default address is created by looking up the endpoint resource from the service manifest. The endpoint resource name is derived from the WCF service contract type using method. If matching endpoint resource is not found in the service manifest, a default endpoint resource definition with port zero is used.
Docs.summary: Constructs a WCF based communication listener that uses specified listener binding and endpoint address derived from the specified endpoint address.

MemberSignature.Value: public WcfCommunicationListener (System.Fabric.ServiceContext serviceContext, TServiceContract wcfServiceObject, System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding listenerBinding = null, string endpointResourceName = null);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Fabric.ServiceContext serviceContext, !TServiceContract wcfServiceObject, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding listenerBinding, string endpointResourceName) cil managed

Docs.param: The context of the service for which this communication listener is being constructed.
WCF service implementing the specified WCF service contract.
The binding to use for the WCF endpoint. If the listenerBinding is not specified or it is null, a default listener binding is created using method.

The name of the endpoint resource defined in the service manifest that should be used to create the address for the listener. If the endpointResourceName is not specified or it is null, its name is derived from the WCF service contract type using method. If matching endpoint resource is not found in the service manifest, a default endpoint resource definition with port zero is used.
Docs.summary: Constructs a WCF based communication listener that uses specified listener binding and endpoint address derived from the specified endpoint resource name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener.Abort() cil managed

Docs.summary: This method causes the communication listener to close. Close is a terminal state and this method causes the transition to close ungracefully. Any outstanding operations (including close) should be canceled when this method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener.CloseAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.summary: This method causes the communication listener to close. Close is a terminal state and this method allows the communication listener to transition to this state in a graceful manner.
Docs.returns: A Task that represents outstanding operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<string> Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener.OpenAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.summary: This method causes the communication listener to be opened. Once the Open completes, the communication listener becomes usable - accepts and sends messages.
Docs.returns: A Task that represents outstanding operation. The result of the Task is the endpoint string.

Docs.summary: Gets the used by this listener to host the WCF service implementation.
Docs.value: A used by this listener to host the WCF service implementation.
Docs.remarks: The service host is created by the listener in its constructor. Before this communication listener is opened by the runtime via method, the service host can be customized by accessing it via this property.
